END as score

name: Overall Trending Arrow Direction
SQL by Operator 2Hr Rate
template:
select total(points) as points, 
total(ismultiplier1+ismultiplier2+ismultiplier3) as multiplier, 
count(distinct call) as totalqsos,
total(isbusted) as busted,
CASE WHEN total(ismultiplier1+ismultiplier2+ismultiplier3) == 0
THEN total(points) 
ELSE total(ismultiplier1+ismultiplier2+ismultiplier3) * total(points)
END as score,
operator as operator,
(select count(operator)
from qsos 
where operator=qout.operator
and timestamp >= datetime('now','-2 hours')) as rate
from qsos qout
group by operator 
order by totalqsos desc;

SQL by Operator 1Hr Rate Sorty by Mults
template:
select total(points) as points, 
total(ismultiplier1+ismultiplier2+ismultiplier3) as multiplier, 
count(call) as totalqsos,
total(isbusted) as busted,
count(case when IsRunQSO == 1 then 1 end) as totalrun,
count(case when IsRunQSO != 1 then 1 end) as totalsandp,
CASE WHEN total(ismultiplier1+ismultiplier2+ismultiplier3) == 0
THEN total(points) 
ELSE total(ismultiplier1+ismultiplier2+ismultiplier3) * total(points)
END as score,
operator as operator,
(select count(operator)
from qsos 
where operator=qout.operator
and timestamp >= datetime('now','-1 hours')) as rate
from qsos qout
group by operator 
order by multiplier desc;

Clear Stats
func:
let arr = []
let obj
for(let i=0;i<9;i++){
    obj = {}
    obj.points = null
    obj.multiplier = null
    obj.totalqsos = null
    obj.busted = null
    obj.totalrun = null
    obj.totalsandp = null
    obj.score = null
    obj.operator = null
    obj.rate = null
    arr.push(obj)
}
//node.warn(arr)
msg.payload = arr
return msg;

name: Insert info DB
template:
insert into qsos (app, contestname, contestnr, timestamp, mycall, band, 
rxfreq, txfreq, operator, mode, call, countryprefix, wpxprefix, stationprefix,
continent, snt, sntnr, rcv, rcvnr, gridsquare, exchange1, section, comment, qth, name, power, 
misctext, zone, prec, ck, ismultiplier1, ismultiplier2, ismultiplier3,
points, radionr, run1run2, RoverLocation, RadioInterfaced, NetworkedCompNr, IsOriginal,
NetBiosName, IsRunQSO, StationName, ID, IsClaimedQso) values 
('{{{payload.contactinfo.app}}}',
'{{{payload.contactinfo.contestname}}}',
'{{{payload.contactinfo.contestnr}}}',
'{{{payload.contactinfo.timestamp}}}',
'{{{payload.contactinfo.mycall}}}',
'{{{payload.contactinfo.band}}}',
'{{{payload.contactinfo.rxfreq}}}',
'{{{payload.contactinfo.txfreq}}}',
'{{{payload.contactinfo.operator}}}',

Database Clear & Status Flows
info:
Clear Stats Only Flow - This flow clears all the line graphs, bar graphs, etc on all the dashboard pages.

Delete All QSOs and Clear Stats Flow - This flow clears all the QSO's in the database and clears all the line graphs, bar graphs, etc on all the dashboard pages.  This action is preformed right before the start of the contest.

Query All Contests in DB - This flow will show you the N1MM short name for all the contests contained in the database.  The database should only contain 1 contest, the current contest.  If a database clear is not performed before the start of a contest, the stats will be calculated for all QSOs in the database.

name: Computer Name Input
info:
Computer Name Input - These are the computer names running N1MM for each radio.  Input the computer names EXACTLY how they defined on the computer name.  Be aware of upper and lower case names.  You can find the computer name by typing 'computername' in the search bar beside the start menu.  

Get Radio Computer Names - This will dispaly the computer names in the database.  

Note : the first two computer names entered into the input fields will be displayed on the N1MM Dashboard main screen (contest overview & map).

name: Contest Call Sign
info:
Contest Call Sign - This input will be used to show Reverse Beacon Spots (RBN) on the map on where that call sign is being spotted FROM.  Callsign can be entered in lower or upper case.  

As spots come in from the spotting network, it searches for the contesting callsign being used.  If it matches, it takes the DE callsign, looks that call up in a database of known RBN callsigns or looked up the DE callsign via QRZ or Hamdb.org based on your preference in which lookup database to use.

name: SQL select points, multis & score
template:
select total(points) as points, 
total(ismultiplier1+ismultiplier2+ismultiplier3) as multiplier, 
count(distinct call) as totalqsos, 
CASE WHEN total(ismultiplier1+ismultiplier2+ismultiplier3) == 0
THEN total(points) 
ELSE total(ismultiplier1+ismultiplier2+ismultiplier3) * total(points)
END as score
from qsos;

Clock Toolbar
format:
<script id="titleScript" type="text/javascript">

$(function() {
    if($('.md-toolbar-tools').length != 0){
        loadClock();
    }else setTimeout(loadClock, 500)
});

function loadClock(){
    $('#clock').remove();
    var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
    
    var div = $('<div/>');
    var p = $('<p/ id="clock">');
    
    div.append(p);
    div[0].style.margin = '5px 5px 5px auto';
    toolbar.append(div);

    function displayTitle(lh) {
        p.text(lh); 
    }
    
    function upTime() {
        var d = new Date();
        p.text(d.toUTCString());
    }

    if(document.clockInterval){ 
            clearInterval(document.clockInterval);
            document.clockInterval = null;
    }
        
    document.clockInterval = setInterval(upTime,1000);
}

</script>

<script>
    (function(scope) {
        //hide this card. NOTE: 4b689f7473831a84 is the Node id as 
        //seen in the INFO panel on the sidebar when you select this node
         $('[node-id="9feb96c66858ba60"]').hide();
        scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
            if ( msg.payload.contestcall.length >= 2) {
                $("#header-contestcall").text(msg.payload.contestcall).prop('title','Contest Call');
              //  $("#header-contestcall").prop('title','Contest Call');
                $("#header-score_total").text(msg.payload.score_total.concat(" ","|")).prop('title','Contest Call Score');
                
            }
            if ( msg.payload.contestcall.length <= 1){
                $("#header-contestcall").text("");
                $("#header-score_total").text("");
            }
        });
    })(scope);
</script>

name: Contest Toolbar Display
info:
# Contest Call Toolbar displays 
The Contest Toolbar update will display the contest name, contest call/score, and chase call/score when an active contest is configured.  If there is no contest the display will show 'No Active Contest'.  During a contest if you mouse over the call or score of any object in the toolbar, a pop up will display the identifier.

## Configuration
If you have a toolbar in your flow you must disable it in order for the contest call toolbar to work properly 

Contest Name is derived from context and will show when the Online Scoreboard Contest Name is set.  The link in node from the Config & Reset Contestname function provides the flow data

Contest Call and Chase Call data is derived from link in nodes from the Online Scoreboard flow.   The link is joined to the output of the Breakout Contest score functions

## UI Update on refresh
The tool bar is currently configured to update the Dashboard,  Online Scoreboard, Spectator Dashboard,  RBN Spots Dashboard, and Band Stats.   If you want to update aditional pages you will need to copy the Contest Toolbar UI update (anyone), and then wire the output of the RBN Spots to your new UI Update.   You will need to update the group for each of the UI nodes in the group to the dashboard page you want update (i.e = Radio Info > Radio 1).  You only need to add it to one group per dashboard page you want to update on refresh

Readme
info:
# Blizuntorg Lighting Detector

Display lighting strike in Km 
Any strike >= 10 Km will show Green Lighting Arrow
Any strike < 10 Km will show Red Lightning Arrow

## **setDistance**
To change distance modify the setDistance function node.  You will need to change the value of n to whatever distance you want.   Also you will need to change the payload string to match the new distance.  Example below shows the value set to 10 Km 

`if(n <= 10) {
 // return distance to strike if strike is in defined radius
 return {payload: '<' + n + ' Km', color: "#c40606", topic: 'lightning'};
} else
 return  {payload: '> 10 Km', color: "#14f00c",};`
 
## **Ui Node**
There are 2 Ui Nodes in the template.  If you only have one dashboard page you can delete the one on the right.  If you have more than 2 dashboard pages you will need to copy and add the Ui Nodes and chain the output from the preceding one to the in input of the next Ui node.  

You will need to set the Ui Node to be in one group per dashboard page in order for those pages to update.   

## **Header Ui**
The header Ui has 2 css div elements.  Spacing of the elements is tricky and may need adjusted depending on what else you have on your toolbar.  You can edit the style.paddingLeft or style.margin to adjust.   Make a copy of the Ui incase you need to fall back to the default.  

## **Audible**
In order for the audiable to work you will need to click on the web page or you will see an error-not allowed msg on the node in the editor.   Currently the text is set to 'Warning Lighting Alert'  To change edit the pushAudible function

name: updateServer K
format:
<script>
    (function(scope) {
        //hide this card. NOTE: 4b689f7473831a84 is the Node id as 
        //seen in the INFO panel on the sidebar when you select this node
         $('[node-id="ebbabd8a26718f21"]').hide();
        scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
            if (msg && msg.topic == "kdx") {
                $("#header-kdx").text(msg.payload);
            }
        });
    })(scope);
</script>

name: updateContestCall
format:
<script>
    (function(scope) {
        //hide this card. NOTE: 4b689f7473831a84 is the Node id as 
        //seen in the INFO panel on the sidebar when you select this node
         $('[node-id="9feb96c66858ba60"]').hide();
        scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
            if ( msg.payload.contestcall.length >= 2) {
                $("#header-contestcall").text(msg.payload.contestcall).prop('title','Contest Call');
              //  $("#header-contestcall").prop('title','Contest Call');
                $("#header-score_total").text(msg.payload.score_total.concat(" ","|")).prop('title','Contest Call Score');
                
            }
            if ( msg.payload.contestcall.length <= 1){
                $("#header-contestcall").text("");
                $("#header-score_total").text("");
            }
        });
    })(scope);
</script>

name: UpdateContestName
format:
<script>
    (function(scope) {
        //hide this card. NOTE: 4b689f7473831a84 is the Node id as 
        //seen in the INFO panel on the sidebar when you select this node
         $('[node-id="7eceb14e06091850"]').hide();
        scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        if ((msg.payload.contestname) != null){
            $("#header-contestname").text(msg.payload.contestname);

        if ((msg.payload.contestname) == null){

        });
    })(scope);
</script>

name: Master style override
format:
<style>
body.nr-dashboard-theme {
 background-color: #333333;
 font-family: Calibri;
}
button { 
  width: 50px; 
  color: #d0d0d0;
  /*box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(0,0, 0, 0.4);*/
  /*border-radius: 1px;*/
  /*transform: scale(1.0);*/
  background-color: #707070;
  background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #8a8a8a6e, #00000070);

}
button, html, input, select, textarea {
 font-family: Calibri;
}
body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
 /*background-color: #33333300;*/
 color: #d0d0d0;
}

/* Set header background style */
body.remove.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar {
 background-image: linear-gradient(to right,#8a8a8a6e, #00000070);
 box-shadow: 0px 1px 20px #0000008a;
}
/* Set groups background style */
.remove.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
 background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #8a8a8a6e, #00000070);
 border: 1px solid #555555;
 box-shadow: 0 0 20px #00000066;
}

/* Set group titles text */
.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
 color: #2eb82e;
 text-shadow: 0 0 2px black;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-form-button {
 background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right,  #8a8a8a6e, #00000070);
 background-color: #00ad03;
 color: #d0d0d0;
 text-shadow: 0 0 2px #525252;
 border-radius:6px;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
 background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right,  #8a8a8a6e, #00000070);
 background-color: #707070;
 color: #d0d0d0;
 text-shadow: 0 0 2px #525252;
 border-radius:6px;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button:hover {
 background-color: #00de00;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-switch md-switch .md-thumb {
 background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #8a8a8a6e, #00000070);
}
.nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
 box-shadow: 0 1px 3px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.26)!important;
 width: 100%!important;
 height: 100%!important;
 margin: 0!important;
 min-width: 0!important;
 min-height: 0!important;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-slider .md-thumb:after {
 background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #8a8a8a6e, #00000070);
 border-style: none;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-numeric .value {
 background-color: #33333300;
 color:#d0d0d0;
}

.nr-dashboard-numeric .value {
 font-weight: 700;
 text-align: center;
 border: 0;
}


.nr-dashboard-form {
 display: inline-block;
 width: 100%;
 overflow-y: visible;
}
#SETTINGS_TEATED_cards {
 min-height: 260px;
}


</style>

      padding: 0;

  font-size: 12px;
  color: white;

<script>
$('.vibrate').on('click', function() {
  navigator.vibrate(100);
});

function restore_bg(x) {
            $(this).css("background-color", x);
    };

$('.touched').on('mousedown', function() {
    
    var x= $(this).css("background-color");
    $(this).css("background-color", "yellow");
    
    setTimeout(restore_bg.bind(this,x),100);
    navigator.vibrate(80);
    });
    
</script>

    <Freq>{{payload.ENTEREVENT.FREQ}}</Freq>
    <TXFreq>{{payload.ENTEREVENT.FREQ}}</TXFreq>

    <OpCall>{{payload.GETUSERSETTINGS.OPERATOR}}</OpCall>
    <IsRunning></IsRunning>
    <FocusEntry></FocusEntry>
    <EntryWindowHwnd></EntryWindowHwnd>
    <Antenna></Antenna>
    <Rotors></Rotors>
    <FocusRadioNr></FocusRadioNr>
    <IsStereo></IsStereo>
    <IsSplit></IsSplit>
    <ActiveRadioNr></ActiveRadioNr>
    <IsTransmitting></IsTransmitting>
    <FunctionKeyCaption>{{global.n3fjp.KEYDOWN.KEYCODE[0]}}</FunctionKeyCaption>
    <RadioName></RadioName>
